standard.description: Tests that are *not* general standards. You are welcome to disagree with them.

test.test_name: Page names should be human friendly
test.query_clob:
select case when aap.page_name like '%\_%' escape '\'
            then 'N'
            else 'Y'
            end pass_yn,
       aap.workspace,
       aap.application_id, 
       aap.page_id,
       aap.created_by,
       aap.created_on,
       aap.last_updated_by,
       aap.last_updated_on,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) is unfriendly', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) validation_failure_message,
       apex_string.format('Page `%0` (app %1, page %2) is unfriendly', 
        p0 => aap.page_name, 
        p1 => aap.application_id,
        p2 => aap.page_id) issue_title,
       aap.page_id component_id,
       null parent_component_id,
       aap.page_name,
       aap.page_mode
from apex_application_pages aap
left outer join apex_application_build_options aabo2 on  aabo2.build_option_name = aap.build_option
                                                     and aabo2.application_id = aap.application_id
where aap.workspace = svt_preferences.get('SVT_WORKSPACE')
and coalesce(aabo2.status_on_export,'NA') != 'Exclude'
and aap.application_id = 17000033
test.explanation: Page names should not have underscores
